title: CISA Catalog of Known Exploited Vulnerabilities

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Dassault Systèmes DELMIA Apriso Code Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Dassault Systèmes DELMIA Apriso contains a code injection vulnerability that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Dassault Systèmes DELMIA Apriso Missing Authorization Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Dassault Systèmes DELMIA Apriso contains a missing authorization vulnerability that could allow an attacker to gain privileged access to the application.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Adobe Commerce and Magento Improper Input Validation Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Adobe Commerce and Magento Open Source contain an improper input validation vulnerability that could allow an attacker to take over customer accounts through the Commerce REST API.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Windows Server Update Service (WSUS) Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows Server Update Service (WSUS) contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Motex LANSCOPE Endpoint Manager Improper Verification of Source of a Communication Channel Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Motex LANSCOPE Endpoint Manager contains an improper verification of source of a communication channel vulnerability allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary code by sending specially crafted packets.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Apple macOS, iOS, tvOS, Safari, and watchOS contain an unspecified vulnerability in JavaScriptCore that when processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. The impacted product could be end-of-life (EoL) and/or end-of-service (EoS). Users should discontinue product utilization.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Kentico Xperience CMS Authentication Bypass Using an Alternate Path or Channel Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Kentico Xperience CMS contains an authentication bypass using an alternate path or channel vulnerability that could allow an attacker to control administrative objects.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Kentico Xperience CMS Authentication Bypass Using an Alternate Path or Channel Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Kentico Xperience CMS contains an authentication bypass using an alternate path or channel vulnerability that could allow an attacker to control administrative objects.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Windows SMB Client Improper Access Control Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows SMB Client contains an improper access control vulnerability that could allow for privilege escalation. An attacker could execute a specially crafted malicious script to coerce the victim machine to connect back to the attack system using SMB and authenticate.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Oracle E-Business Suite Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Oracle E-Business Suite contains a server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in the Runtime component of Oracle Configurator. This vulnerability is remotely exploitable without authentication.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Adobe Experience Manager Forms Code Execution Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Adobe Experience Manager Forms in JEE contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for arbitrary code execution.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: IGEL OS Use of a Key Past its Expiration Date Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: IGEL OS contains a use of a key past its expiration date vulnerability that allows for Secure Boot bypass. The igel-flash-driver module improperly verifies a cryptographic signature. Ultimately, a crafted root filesystem can be mounted from an unverified SquashFS image.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Windows Untrusted Pointer Dereference Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows Agere Modem Driver contains an untrusted pointer dereference vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain administrator privileges.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Windows Improper Access Control Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows contains an improper access control vulnerability in Windows Remote Access Connection Manager which could allow an authorized attacker to elevate privileges locally.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: SKYSEA Client View Improper Authentication Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: SKYSEA Client View contains an improper authentication vulnerability that allows remote code execution via a flaw in processing authentication on the TCP connection with the management console program.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.
